verbs.description: Numerous local organizations [V: will] protest against the Trump administration 's immigration policy in Homestead on Saturday as part of the nationwide March to Keep Families Together .

Numerous local organizations will protest against the Trump administration 's immigration policy in Homestead on Saturday as part of the nationwide March to [V: Keep] [ARG1: Families Together] .
